attributes.action: People must stay at home with sick pay to prevent further spreading of COVID-19.
attributes.background: Unfortunately COVID-19 is spreading rapidly and sadly people are losing their beloved ones, it's time to take serious action. People must work from home or stay at home with sick pay to prevent further spreading. Also we must minimise large people's gathering to avoid spreading.

rejection.details:
We understand that you want people to stay at home and receive sick pay to prevent further spreading of COVID-19, but it's not clear exactly what you want the Government to do to achieve this.

We have accepted a petition calling on the Government to consider closing down offices and order working from home: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301439

we have also accepted a petition calling on the Government to ensure employees are paid their full wage if they can't work due to coronavirus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652

The Government has advised people to work from home if they possible can: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/pm-mothers-day-words-22-march-2020

The Government has also created a Coronavirus Job Retention Scheme to enable all UK employers will be able to access support to continue paying part of their employees’ salary for those employees that would otherwise have been laid off during this crisis: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/guidance-to-employers-and-businesses-about-covid-19/covid-19-support-for-businesses#support-for-businesses-through-the-coronavirus-job-retention-scheme

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
